name: Sugarverse
description: Sugarverse is a pioneering Web3 gaming company built on the Etherlink chain, focused on creating sustainable, and engaging mobile gaming experiences. With over 18 years of experience as a Web2 mobile gaming studio, the company behind Sugarverse has published 10+ successful games and amassed a network of 60M players worldwide. The company transitions its proven expertise to Web3, building a decentralized ecosystem of interconnected games powered by $CNDY, its native utility token. Sugarverse bridges Web2 and Web3 gaming through innovative mechanics, intuitive onboarding, and a player-owned governance model.
